modes.notes: London Underground (Tube) with 11 lines; Night Tube on some lines for late-night travel.
Elizabeth line connects Heathrow to Paddington (30 min), central London, and other airports.
Extensive network including night buses (e.g., N9 from Heathrow).
Overground, Elizabeth line, and suburban trains; Heathrow Express (15 min to Paddington).
Fast train from Heathrow T2/3 to Paddington (15 min).

payment_methods.details: Pay as you go on Tube, buses, Elizabeth line, Overground; daily/weekly capping.
Unlimited travel for set zones and periods.
Pre-loaded for short stays; available online or at airports.

operating_hours.weekday: Tube: ~5AM-12:30AM (peak every 2-5 min); Buses 24/7 with night services.
operating_hours.weekend: Tube: ~5:30AM-12:30AM; Night Tube on Fridays/Saturdays extends to ~5AM on select lines; Buses 24/7.
operating_hours.night_service: Night Tube (Fri-Sat) on Central, Jubilee, Northern, Piccadilly, Victoria lines; Night buses all nights.

rideshare.notes: Widely available; licensed black cabs also common (fixed fares to center ~£50-80).

airport_connections.name: N9 night bus to Trafalgar Square

tips: Get Oyster/contactless for capping (max daily spend ~£8.50 Zones 1-2); Use TfL Go app for live updates/routes; Avoid peak hours (6:30-9:30AM) on Tube if possible; Black cabs are reliable for luggage/groups.
